name: Shut Eye
description: Keep her calm. Keep her safe. Keep her in the light.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.0 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia 320M or higher, or Radeon 7000 or higher, or Intel HD 3000 or higher DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 250 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Terrifying ambiance, pretty good jumpscared, and creepy enemys. A great horror title for its price.
